name: Select Input
description: This is an example of description that could be used for this kind of situations where your dont know what to say

api.description: with this property you activate the multiselect function
with this property you add style to the selected items
with this property you can set the max height of the item list
this is the value of the autocomplete
with this property you set the array of options
Callback function that is fired when the autocomplete value changes

features.description: with the GSSelect Input you can choose to select more than one option
with the GSSelect Input you can style the items that you choose
with the GSSelectInput component you can choose the maximun height of the autocomplete items list
